sub_title: Project Manager / Bulk Materials Handling Consultant at Royal HaskoningDHV
summary:
I am a a transportation and logistics engineer specialised in bulk material handling systems and logistic processes in bulk terminals and plants. 

I gained experience in numerous bulk terminal projects world-wide. The projects varied from (pre-) feasibility studies to master-planning, conceptual design, preparation of tender documentation and actual project implementation and construction supervision but also due-diligences. Nearly all projects are multi-disciplinary involving expertise like marine civil design, financial feasibility and EIA.

In St.Petersburg I am ultimately responsible for the quality of the bulk material handling projects which we do from our local office. I am also the linking pin between our local team and our bulk handling centre of excellence in Rotterdam.

profile_positions.description: Back home in the Netherlands after 7 years abroad with the family: first Russia then Indonesia. From Project Management and FEED for a greenfield coal export facility on Kalimantan, to home office in Rotterdam where all is vibrant with Energy Transition, Industry 4.0, Predictive Simulation, Digital Twins, and the like: exiting times. Enjoying a consultancy role about Materials Handling & Logistics.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager / Bulk Materials Handling Consultant

profile_positions.description: I worked and lived for 3 year in Jakarta with the family. I enjoyed an expert position with responsibility for the APAC region. (Technical) Due Diligences in Myanmar, Malaysia and Sri-Lanka, Port Master Planning in Malaysia and Indonesia, down-stream mining infrastructure projects on Kalimantan, and at the same time project management for FEED of a greenfield coal export terminal facility on Kalimantan. We managed a healthy workload during tough market conditions. I got to know a lot of interesting people out there. Thanks to you all. Now back to the Netherlands to let the boys grow some roots.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager / Bulk Material Handling Consultant, Jakarta Office

profile_positions.description:
In our RHDHV St.Petersburg office I am the head of our bulk material handling group and ultimately responsible for the quality of the projects in that field. Furthermore I contribute to the growth of the group both in numbers and in knowledge. Last but not least I am the linking pin between our local team and our bulk material handling centre of excellence in Rotterdam.

A recent project example is a pit-to-port logistics study to determine the optimum logistics chain to export up to 10 mtpa of coal from Sakhalin Island.

Other projects I contributed to from our St.Petersburg office are:
- Concept Design and Project documentation for a 20 mtpa coal export terminal in Russia's Far East
- Concept Design and Project documentation for a 35 mtpa coal, iron ore and sulphur export terminal at the Black Sea coast
- Concept Design and Tender Documentation for a 5 mtpa grain export terminal in Ukraine
- Due-Diligence for a 4 mpta grain export terminal in Ukraine
- Concept design for a 4 mtpa grain export terminal in Ukraine
- Technical Due Diligence of a multi-modal soy processing and grain import/export terminal in Russia
- Review of a conceptual design for a 2.5 mtpa grain export terminal in Ukraine
- Technical audit of expansion plans of coal export terminal in the Russian Far East
- Review of the conceptual design for 20 mpta coal export terminal in Russia
- Optimisation of the Tender Design for a phosphate export terminal in Peru
profile_positions.title: Head of Bulk Material Handling Dept., St.Petersburg Office

profile_positions.description:
I started at Royal Haskoning as a project engineer in the field of dry bulk material handling. I gained experience in numerous bulk terminal projects world-wide. The projects varied from (pre-) feasibility studies to master-planning, conceptual design, preparation of tender documentation and actual project implementation and construction supervision but also due-diligences. Nearly all projects are multi-disciplinary.

The last year before I went to St.Petersburg with my family I acted as team-leader in the field of bulk material handling.

A nice project example is the new phosphate export terminal in the Aqaba South Port. I was involved in master planning, conceptual design, tender design and tender documentation as well as the tendering process itself. After that I contributed to the construction supervision and back-office support. The terminal is now up and running and visible in google-earth!

Other projects included pit-to-port studies, floating transhipment studies, coal fired power plant fuel and waste handling optimisation studies, tender documentation for a fly-ash terminal, conceptual design and due-diligences of several grain export terminals.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer
